quote: The connection of two souls is inseperable, When I met you it was better than that...
name: Warmth

quote: Struggling through that phase but still holding on, That's you.
name: Trust

quote: Making me to understand that feeling and the reason of my craziness.
name: Passion

quote: Accepting me and agreeing for this path.
name: Love

quote: Your smile that makes the whole world small for me.
name: Joy

quote: Those moments when I tease you and wait for your angry face.
name: Fun

name: Hug

name: Sweet

name: Kiss

quote: Every second with you is like starring the stars, its beautiful.
name: Time

quote: The time when I make fun of your height.

quote: The time when I look into your eyes.

quote: I am nothing without you, Thanks for everything.
